title: Yorkshire breaking news: Latest updates - BBC News
summary: funeral of stabbed supermarket worker jodie willsher .
two fight for life after bus stop crash .
men released following human trafficking raids .
rail commuters warned of industrial action on some trains .
ex-queen ethelburga teacher banned for pupil relationship .
call for urgent meeting over north york moors fracking .
sheffield casino closes doors after 42 years .
plans for york flood defences go on show .
barnsley politician wages war on fly-tippers .
'catch ' to owls season ticket refund offer .

documents.title: drivers stuck for hours after m1 crash
text: drivers stuck for hours after m1 crash

documents.title: quadruple amputee girl 'to return home '
text: quadruple amputee girl 'to return home '

documents.title: our five top stories
text: that 's all from us for today , we 'll be back tomorrow from 06:30 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for yorkshire .
updates on breaking news will continue throughout the night , but before we go , let 's look back at some of our top stories from today :
see you tomorrow .

documents.title: m1 closed for hours near leeds
text: a lorry driver 's been taken to hospital after his hgv overturned on the m1 in west yorkshire this afternoon .
the southbound carriageway between j46 and j45 near garforth is closed , and traffic northbound is being held while debris is cleared .
the motorway has been closed for several hours .

documents.title: 'no journalists are left in this van overnight '
text: this helpful bit of information was spotted on the back of a satellite truck .
spotted this important message written in the dirt on the back of the @ twitterid satellite truck
spotted in kent last year .
never any real journalist in attendance at any itv reports so no surprises
itv plenty of left journalists !
just no right ones
maybe it should read : no journalists left .
should of finished it off with only the weatherman .
should have not should of !
one of my pet hates .
a never forced you to read it .
it 's the fact that none are in there during the daytime that worries me .
@ twitterid @ twitterid i 'm not so sure that 's true !
and it 's 'is ' not 'are '
if it was tools i 'd check .
but journalists , no
should say .
no regurgitators are left on this van overnight .
a pity
robert peston always looks like he 's slept in the back of a dirty van .
or during the day .
( joke !
support regional news ! )
@ twitterid

documents.title: m1 closure : both carriageways remain closed
text: the m1 remains shut between j46 and j45 near leeds this evening after a lorry overturned :

documents.title: fed up of fly-tipping ? one man in south yorkshire has waged war on it
text: this man 's seriously fed up with the situation in barnsley
you 've been sharing your views on the bbc radio sheffield facebook page
it happens everywhere , i 've seen it around where i live in shirebrook , there is no excuse , they need to do more enforcement . ''
it would be better if tips did n't charge a fee , but was paid for through council tax , cheaper in the long run and we would n't have this eyesore all the while . ''
this is now happening behind work buildings on industrial estates too where my gymnastics club is where children have to walk through to get to the door .
it 's beyond a joke . ''
author: Jenny Eells
Digital Producer, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: m1 crash : debris being cleared
text: highways england has been keeping people up-to-date with the situation on the m1 .
they 're cleaning up the debris after a lorry overturned between j46 and j45 near leeds , they hope to reopen the northbound carriageway soon :
# m1 # westyorkshire is closed in both directions between j46 and j45 near # leeds due to an overturned lorry with debris across carriageway .
@ twitterid are on scene with the collision and @ twitterid has now left scene , diversion details here :
what on earth is going on ? !
i 've been sat stuck with a two year old for an hour and a half , when will we be moving ?
good afternoon .
which direction are you travelling ?
northbound
currently we 're removing debris from the road .
once it is clear we 'll be releasing the northbound traffic .
hopefully it wo n't be much longer for you .
can you tell me when this will be cleared northbound , the highways england website suggests it wo n't be until 2245 , your earlier tweet contradicts this .
the given clearance time is based on the latest info from the scene .
this time is an estimate and can be amended based on further info we receive about the progress of investigations and clean-up .
i 've a special needs son in his taxi stuck northbound ! ! !
ca n't police let them drive down hard shoulder to j 46 !
not good enough i 'm frantic ! ! !
it 's horrendous .
luckily i have an ipad and sweets .
the latest is they are going to u-turn us round from the back which will take forever

documents.title: m1 closure - police warning
text: if you are stuck in the traffic on the m1 after the lorry crash , a word of warning from west yorkshire police :
the motorway remains closed in both directions between j45 and j46 near leeds .
we are aware the m1 is very busy .
however that does n't mean you can use the hard shoulder to exit the motorway .
it is an offence and if caught you will be stopped and dealt with by traffic officers .
further update for the m1 , junction 45 northbound will be closed shortly for investigation work .
incident plan ? ?
traffic diversions ? ?
help ? ?
how long ? ?
update ? ?
nearly 4hrs
some idiot blocking hard shoulder carrying his baby up and down pleading with traffic officers to let him through
why is the slip road up to colton not open ? ? ?
just like you should n't be reading this , if you 're driving on the m1 .
warning people are starting to drive southbound on the northbound hard shoulder
how about you let us off at colton then instead ! !
is junction 45 even open as no one is coming off it .
fancying bringing me a drink .
been sat here 3/4hours
stuck between 45 and 46 since happened no info
any update
well ? ?

documents.title: listen : coroner calls for safety measures after deaths
text: a coroner 's to ask the government to consider safety measures on the a64 in ryedale where two couples died just weeks apart .
julie gough and her partner david tinker were the first to lose their lives when they were hit by a minibus while crossing the road at crambeck last may after a night out in york .
two other pedestrians died nearby the following month .
look north 's peter harris says the coroner has recorded a verdict of accidental death on julie gough and david tinker at the inquest into their deaths in northallerton .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: two hour delays after lorry overturns on m1
text: a man has been injured after a lorry overturned on the m1 northbound between j45 and j46 this afternoon , both carriageways have been closed for several hours .
look north 's clare frisby has been stuck at the scene of the accident for two hours :
# m1 j45-46 overturned lorry .
been here for nearly two hours avoid the area and surrounding roads .
thinking of you clare hopefully you will be out by 08.45 saturday
at least you will be at home soon .
have a safe journey �
excellent update traffic news clare .
thanks
oh no awful - hope you 're soon on your way .

documents.title: stab victim remains in hospital after attack in sheffield bar
text: a man stabbed on a night out in sheffield remains in hospital today - nine days after the attack .
the 22-year-old suffered life threatening injuries when violence flared in crystal on carver street in the early hours of new year 's day .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: travel update : m1 crash causing public transport problems
text: the accident on the m1 is causing public transport problems too :
# leeds - delays to various @ twitterid services due to the closure of the m1 at junctions 48-49 .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: teenager and woman fight for life after bus stop crash
text: two teenage girls have been injured after a car crashed into a bus stop in huddersfield this morning - one was airlifted to hospital .
it happened on wakefield road at about 08:15 when a grey bmw 5 series car hit the bus stop near the junction of broad lane in moldgreen .
a 47-year-old woman and two girls , a 15 and 17-year old , were injured - the 47-year-old and the 15-year-old were left with life-threatening injuries .
the driver of the car was also taken to hospital with non life-threatening injuries .
west yorkshire police say they 're looking for witnesses .

documents.title: sheffield united sign midfielder and striker
text: sheffield united have signed wolves midfielder lee evans for an undisclosed fee on a four-and-a-half-year deal and manchester united striker james wilson on loan until the end of the season .
evans , 23 , spent the first half of the campaign on loan with league one side wigan , scoring three times in 24 games .
wilson , 22 , has not played a senior game since a serious knee injury up while with derby in october 2016 .
both players could feature against city rivals sheffield wednesday on friday .
according to the terms of his transfer to wolves from newport in 2013 , the welsh side will receive 15 % of evans ' fee , which is reported to be £ 750,000 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: a self-healing mobile phone ? yes , really
text: so , how would you like a mobile phone that mends itself ?
it could be a step closer today .
sheffield hallam university has just received a £ 300k grant for research into self healing materials .
they 're part of a project which is aiming to create materials for use in inaccessible places such as deep-sea cables or radioactive sites .
but the scientists that in the future they could potentially come up with smartphones with screens that can mend themselves if they become damaged .
author: Katie Galbraith
Local Live, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: police officer 'assaulted ' by tree protester
text: a 57 year old man has been arrested following a protest on sheffield 's meersbrook park road over felling of trees in the city .
south yorkshire police have told the bbc that officers attended meersbrook park road , sheffield at around 12:20 today following a report that a group of people were obstructing the road .
the majority of the group were compliant with officers requests to leave the area , however a 57-year-old man was arrested on sus of wilful obstruction of a highway .
he has also been arrested on sus of assaulting a police officer .
the officer suffered minor injuries during the incident which did not require hospital treatment . ''
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: one man injured in m1 lorry crash
text: an overturned lorry has closed the m1 near leeds this afternoon , one man has been injured according to west yorkshire police .
this is the latest from the scene :
it 's not clear if anyone else has been involved , the air ambulance has landed .

documents.title: breakingsheffield trees protest arrest
text: a 57-year-old man 's been arrested in sheffield on sus of wilful obstruction of a highway .
campaigners say it was during a protest on meersbrook park road.against the felling of trees in the city .
the trees are being felled as part of sheffield city council 's £ 2bn streets ahead project , which the authority says is to improve roads and footpaths in the city .
about 5,500 trees have been cut down since 2012 .
the authority insists those earmarked for felling are either `` dangerous , dead , diseased , dying , damaging or discriminatory '' .
however , campaigners claim many of the trees classed by the council as `` damaging '' or `` discriminatory '' are healthy specimens which should not be cut down .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: m1 shut latest : people leave cars to look at crash
text: an overturned lorry on the m1 near leeds has stopped traffic in both directions this afternoon between j45 and j46 .
people on the motorway have left their cars to get a better look at the crash site :
drivers have reported not moving for the last 30 minutes .
highways england say the road could be closed until 18:00 tonight .
it 's not clear if there are any injures .

documents.title: m1 closed after lorry overturns
text: the m1 near leeds has been closed southbound between j45 and j46 this afternoon after a lorry overturned .
the air ambulance has landed at the scene but it not clear how many casualties there are - the northbound carriageway had to be closed so it could land .
traffic is n't expected to get back to normal until after 18:00 tonight .
we 'll bring you more as we get it

documents.title: travel update : overturned lorry on m1
text: a lorry has overturned on the m1 this afternoon , the road is currently closed at leeds :
the # m1 # westyorkshire is closed southbound between j46 and j45 near # leeds due to an overturned lorry , @ twitterid are on scene .
@ twitterid is about to land and the northbound carriageway has been blocked to allow this .
please plan ahead .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: funeral of stab victim
text: the funeral is taking place in skipton of jodie willsher .
the 30-year-old died after being stabbed while working at a supermarket in the town .
hundreds of people have gathered both inside and outside christ church in skipton .
malcolm willsher took the coffin of his wife into the church ahead of her funeral .
a man is under arrest and has been charged with murder .

documents.title: men released following human trafficking raids
text: a man from sheffield who was arrested following a major operation to tackle human trafficking has been released .
raids were carried out yesterday at one address in the city and seven in stockton-on-tees .
cleveland police said ten men aged between 18 and 47 were arrested on sus of different offences including rape , conspiracy to commit human trafficking , drugs offences and blackmail .
they have now all been released under investigation .

documents.title: listen : funeral being held for supermarket stab victim
text: the funeral of jodie willsher is taking place today .
the 30-year-old was stabbed to death just days before christmas while working at a supermarket in skipton .
two-hundred-and-fifty people are now inside christ church , skipton with hundreds also gathered outside .
her family say it will be a celebration of her life and her husband malcolm has asked those attending to wear something pink to remember his wife .
the funeral is being led by ruth harris , the vicar of christ church :
neville hord , who 's 44 , is in custody charged with her murder at an aldi store in the town .

documents.title: listen : harrogate miss opportunity to go top of league
text: harrogate town 's players and management know they missed a great opportunity last night , with defeat at nuneaton .
the 2-1 loss meant they did n't go top of the national league north table .
manager , simon weaver says it 's disappointing , but they have to move on .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: three in hospital after huddersfield bus stop crash
text: two women and a man have been taken to hospital after a car crash in huddersfield this morning .
it happened on wakefield road at 08:30 when a black bmw crashed into a bus stop .
the male driver and two women who were at the bus stop were taken to hospital for treatment , one was airlifted .
road closures are still in place and drivers are being asked to avoid the area .

documents.title: ferrybridge could become gas power station
text: the owners of ferrybridge power station , which closed in 2016 , have announced the site could reopen as a gas power station .
sse have announced that they have begun a consultation for the new gas-fired power station at the site of the original at the ferrybridge `` c '' plant .
the new site , catchily known as ferrybridge `` d '' , would produce 2,000mw of power , enough for two million homes .
it 's thought the old buildings will be demolished this year .
the coal-fired power station closed after 50 years in service in march in 2016 .
the company said a projected loss of £ 100m over the next five years meant ferrybridge was `` no longer economical '' .

documents.title: £ 1m facelift for barnsley borough shops
text: barnsley council has approved plans which will see £ 1m spent on improving the look of shops in villages around the borough .
it 's after discussions with local business leaders and community organisations around regenerating towns across the wider barnsley area .
shop fronts will be improved in goldthorpe , cudworth , royston , athersley , darfield , dodworth , grimethorpe , lundwood , mapplewell , stairfoot and thurnscoe .
local businesses will also be contributing towards the scheme .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: harrogate gallery to mark 100 years of votes for women
text: a new exhibition celebrating a hundred years since women got the vote opens at harrogate 's mercer art gallery this weekend .
picturing women features a mix of historic and contemporary art , pioneering photography , ink drawings , paintings and sculpture by female artists from the gallery 's harrogate collection .
below is an example of some of the work which you 'll be able to see .

jane sellars is in charge of cultural services at harrogate borough council and says the exhibition shows how , despite many social constraints , women artists went on to achieve very successful careers .
the exhibition runs until june .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: hunt for members of sheffield gang wanted over murder
text: four members of a gang wanted over a murder in sheffield have not yet been tracked down - three years after the 'cold blooded execution'.read more here .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: firearm found in york
text: a police investigation is under way after a firearm was found in york .
it was discovered by a road worker on the wiggington road at around 10:00 this morning .
officers have recovered the weapon and an investigation has begun .

documents.title: fire safety work starts to remove cladding from leeds sky plaza
text: work is now underway to address a raft of fire safety concerns at a leeds student flats building .
author: Yorkshire Evening Post

documents.title: ex-queen ethelburga teacher banned for pupil relationship
text: a former teacher who had a sexual relationship with a sixth form pupil has been banned from teaching for life .
dr howard britton , 64 , taught economics at fee-paying queen ethelburga 's school , near york , between 2001 and 2005 .
a disciplinary panel heard his sexual relationship with the girl began on the day of her final exams .
dr britton stopped teaching after the relationship ended due to his `` disgust '' at his behaviour , the panel heard .
between january and june he had accepted the girl 's number , exchanged flirtatious and sexual text messages , discussed meeting her outside of school and invited her to his home .
he also held hands with her and touched her legs .
the relationship became sexual in june and july .

documents.title: yorkshire wildlife park to expand despite concerns
text: a £ 56m expansion of the yorkshire wildlife park in doncaster has been given the go-ahead .
there 'll be a new hotel - more animal enclosures as well as cafes and restaurants - but there are concerns about road safety .
the new entrance will be on hurst lane which has two schools nearby .
the plans also include more animal enclosures .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: call for urgent meeting over north york moors fracking
text: national park bosses say they want a meeting with a fracking company over its plans for the north york moors .
companies are not allowed to frack in national parks , but can drill underneath from outside .
ineos wants to do a survey on the moors before drilling test wells .
the park says it opposes any exploration to protect the landscape long-term .

documents.title: woman who lost engagement ring in milton keynes finds it 16 months later
text: a woman from yorkshire who lost her engagement ring in newport pagnell had the perfect christmas present when she found it more than a year later with the aid of a metal detector .
author: Milton Keynes Citizen

documents.title: boxing : could khan signing lead to brook showdown ?
text: boxer amir khan is due to make a big announcement about his career this lunchtime .
khan 's thought to be joining the sport promotion company matchrooom , which could protentially lead to a fight with sheffield 's kell brook , who is also managed by the company .
author: Nick Wilson
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: teenager arrested after attack on police car
text: police investigating an attack on a police car at the weekend in harrogate say they 've arrested and released a 17-year-old boy pending further investigations .
the incident happened on saturday night in the bilton area of the town .
two police community support officers were in the car when a pipe smashed through the back window .
they had been responding to a reports of youths throwing objects at cars passing the area .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: leeds united full-back out for the rest of the season
text: leeds united defender luke ayling has been ruled out for the rest of the season after having ankle surgery .
the 26-year-old suffered an injury in the 0-0 draw with nottingham forest on new year 's day .
the former bristol city player made 30 appearances in all competitions for thomas christensen 's side this season .
meanwhile , the elland road side are closing in on a deal to sign club brugge left-back laurens de bock , 25 , bbc radio leeds understands .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: listen : 'catch ' to owls season ticket refund offer
text: what do you make of this ?
a sheffield wednesday fan , who wanted a refund on his hillsborough season ticket , says there 's a catch .
before christmas , owls chairman dejphon chansiri promised supporters a refund if they were unhappy with the club 's performance this season .
glyn turton tried to do just that :
the club have confirmed the terms and conditions of the refund .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: listen : no deal on devolution impacting on investment
text: mps from across the political spectrum fear yorkshire is missing out on investment because there is no agreement on devolution .
elections for a mayor for south yorkshire are due to take place in may , but doncaster and barnsley say they now want to join the so called 'one yorkshire ' deal .
the comments came as the issue was debated yesterday at westminster .
york central labour mp rachael maskell says we are fast becoming a poor relation :
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: barnsley councillor wages war on fly-tipping
text: barnsley parish councillor , kevin osborne says he 's having to wage a personal war against fly-tipping because the local authority is n't doing enough .
there 's only been one successful prosecution of a fly-tipper by barnsley council in the last year .
kevin 's taken to twitter using the light-hearted epithet of tossers - about those who toss away their rubbish in places they should n't .
dear mrs morgan .
you appear to be a well off tosser .
i was running down the bypass this evening from grimethorpe to darfield , you should see the stuff dumped down there as you go under the bridge after asos .
sheds , tyres , beds disgraceful .
asos side or grimethorpe side ?
on the road or by the yellow bridge ?
right hand side after asos as you get near the bottom roundabout at middlecliffe .
there 's an entrance to a farmers field that 's blocked by a dumped shed !
was the bank account and sort code left showing too ?
the full monty
crazy !
so stupid though , she could leave herself open to all sorts of scams by doing this .
# serveherright
dear charlie .
mummy may love you but she does n't love barnsley .
she 's a tosser .
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: travel update : crash causing long delays in halifax
text: a crash on the a58 in the centre of halifax is causing problems , it 's now been cleared but you can expect about an hour 's worth of delays .
`` buses - 681/508/549/548 - # update # rtc has been cleared now .
road is open both directions .
serious delays to service up to 60 minutes at the moment rtc at burdock way- new bank halifax .
road closed by police both directions .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: flytipping across south yorkshire
text: we 've been hearing about one man 's crusade against fly-tipping in barnsley , after areas around the town became littered over christmas .
and now these scenes from sheffield .
have you got a problem where you live ?
get in touch .
author: BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: missing leeds teenager found safe and well
text: a teenager who went missing from batley has been found .
thirteen-year-old candice manners had n't been seen since last week , but west yorkshire police say she 's now been found safe and well .

documents.title: man missing after accident in north yorkshire found
text: police say that 74 year old terence beadle has been found .
he disappeared following an accident last night at marton-le-moor near harrogate .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: niche sheffield : club to remain closed until february
text: a sheffield city centre bar is to remain closed for a further seven days after a court hearing was adjourned .
crystal bar on carver street was issued with a closure notice on new years day after five people were injured in a stabbing incident .
more discussions will now take place between police and the bar over public safety .
the matter will be heard again at sheffield magistrates ' court next tuesday .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: strike : rail passengers advised to check before travelling
text: rail passengers in yorkshire and lincolnshire could face more disruption today as train staff take part in another day of strike action .
members of the rmt union also walked out on monday in the long-running row over the role of guards .
some northern trains are being cancelled or replaced by buses .
there 'll be another day of industrial action on friday .
author: BBC Look North

documents.title: police asking motorists to avoid this part of huddersfield
text: a serious accident is causing long delays in huddersfield .
west yorkshire police
westyorkspolice
road closures are in place around broad lane , huddersfield due to a road traffic collision at 8.30am this morning .
twitter.com/i/web/status/9
road closures are in place around broad lane , huddersfield due to a road traffic collision at 8.30am this morning .
emergency services are on scene and drivers are urged to avoid the area .
the incident remains on-going .
road closures are in place around broad lane , huddersfield due to a road traffic collision at 8.30am this morning .
emergency services are on scene and drivers are urged to avoid the area .
the incident remains on-going .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: heavy rain and fog causing difficult driving conditions
text: west yorkshire police tell us they 've had multiple reports of collisions this morning .
they say it is due to the weather .
they 're asking people to take more care .
fog is still quite thick in parts of west yorkshire .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: watch : cloudy with outbreaks of rain
text: here 's my forecast for today :
author: Lisa Gallagher
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: bye-bye naps : sheffield casino to close after 42 years
text: sheffield 's napoleon 's casino is closing its doors after 42 years on ecclesall road .
in a statement on their website they say they want to concentrate on their owlerton site and a new casino that they 're opening in manchester .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: traffic and travel : delays on east coast mainline
text: if you 're travelling to london or scotland today this could affect your journey .
virgin trains ec
virgin trainsec
# vtecupdate due to the earlier broken down train at # newarknorthgate services are moving through the station but ma twitter.com/i/web/status/9

BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: york flood defence plans go on show
text: the city of york and surrounding areas are no strangers to the problems of flooding .
there will be plenty of us who remember images like this :
it was a difficult time for so many people across our area .
today plans for flood defences in part of the city will be on show .
the environment agency is spending £ 45m in the city to try and prevent a repeat of the 2015 floods .
here 's what they want to do :
you can see the plans and have your say at the environment agency 's hub on wellington row from 10:00 - 19:00 .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: traffic and travel : station road , thurnscoe closed in both directions
text: b6411 station road at thurnscoe is closed in both directions .
station road in both directions closed , slow traffic due to police incident between stuart street and holly bush drive .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: listen : leeds should have 'year of culture '
text: officials in leeds are being urged to host their own year of culture after they failed to win their bid to be european capital of culture .
the city was one of five places in the uk bidding to take the title in 2023 .
but the european commission stopped the process saying uk cities could no longer take part because of brexit .
conservative councillor neil buckley will open a full council debate on the issue later .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: listen : barnsley council 'ignoring fly-tipping '
text: a parish councillor from barnsley says he 's having to wage a personal war against fly-tipping because the local authority is not doing enough .
kevin osbourne says in the past year he 's found dozens of piles of rubbish , but there 's only been one successful prosecution of a fly-tipper by barnsley council during that time .
he says the council 's missing opportunities to punish fly-tippers .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: funeral of stabbed supermarket worker jodie willsher
text: the funeral is taking place today of jodie willsher who was stabbed to death just days before christmas while working at a supermarket in skipton .
her family say it will be a celebration of her life .
her husband malcolm has asked those attending to wear something pink to remember his wife .
neville hord , who 's 44 , is in custody charged with her murder at an aldi store in the town .
it will be closed today as a mark of respect .
an online appeal for jodie willsher 's husband and daughter has raised over £ 16,000 .

documents.title: traffic and travel : all lanes reopened on m62 eastbound
text: all lanes open and traffic returned to normal , accident cleared on m62 eastbound between j33 a162 ( ferrybridge services ) and j34 a19 ( selby /doncaster ) .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: trains at standstill between sheffield and wakefield
text: crosscountry trains tell us that trains are at a standstill between sheffield and wakefield westgate due to emergency services dealing with an incident at thurnscoe .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: traffic and travel : lane closed on m62 eastbound
text: this accident will slow you down this morning .
slow traffic and one lane closed due to accident on m62 eastbound between j33 a162 ( ferrybridge services ) and 34 a19 ( selby /doncaster ) .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: weather : cloud , mist , rain but getting drier this afternoon
text: cloudy and misty through the morning with outbreaks of rain and drizzle , and fog on the hills .
drier and brighter conditions will spread from the west in the afternoon , but probably not reaching eastern areas until evening .
tonight there 'll be patchy light rain or drizzle may linger overnight in some eastern parts , otherwise dry with light winds , leading to a local frost and some patchy mist or fog .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: man missing after accident in north yorkshire
text: police say they 're concerned about terrence beadle , aged 74 , who 's gone missing missing following an accident near marton-le-moor which happened 18:30 last night .
they 're asking for the public 's help in trying to find him .
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: traffic and travel : planned industrial action on trains
text: there is planned industrial action today as rmt members at five rail operators walk out for the second time this week .
northern says the majority of available trains will be between 0700 and 1900 .
otherwise rains across yorkshire are mostly running on time this morning .
you can check the details here :
author: Elly Fiorentini
BBC Yorkshire Live

documents.title: good morning : latest updates from north yorkshire
text: we 'll be with you throughout the day for the latest news , sport , travel and weather across yorkshire .
it is very murky start to the day with rain and mist around .
how gorgeous does the sky look in this photograph ?
it was taken by one of our weather watchers in farlington near york .
if you have any photos you 'd like to share or news you think we should know about , you can get in touch by simply clicking here .
author: Elly Fiorentini
